attributes.action: A petition to stop people starting petitions just because they're upset.
attributes.background:
Too many people in this Country obviously lack moral fibre and a stiff upper lip anymore. They need to grow up, man up and suck it up when things don't go their way.
Tally Ho!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition calling for a specific change to the rules for petitions. You can find out about the rules here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/help
